RelatedSentence: Indiana State Police are offering a series of summer youth camps throughout the state which open June 12 .
Kids will get to watch demonstrations by the state police SWAT team and bomb squad , divers and crime scene technicians .
Kids will get to watch demonstrations by the state police SWAT team and bomb squad , divers and crime scene technicians .
The camps are open to students entering grades 5 - 13 .
